result.error_message:
io.cucumber.scala.IncorrectStepDefinitionException: The arguments received doesn't match the step definition.
This can happen if you are using a regular expression in your step definition with optional capture groups but mandatory parameters.

For instance:

  Given("""^I am logged in(?: as (.+))?$""") { (user: String) =>
    // Some code
  }

For now, the easiest solution is to declare two steps: one with the capture groups, one without.
If you feel this is not working for you, please manifest yourself on https://github.com/cucumber/cucumber-jvm-scala/issues/3
